definition: A structure made of wooden planks or slats that is commonly used to enclose or mark boundaries of outdoor spaces, such as gardens, yards, or fields. It serves as a protective barrier or decorative element, providing privacy and defining property lines.

examples.german: Der Holzzaun steht schon seit Jahren.
examples.english: The wooden fence has been standing for years.

examples.german: Wir haben einen Holzzaun um unseren Garten.
examples.english: We have a wooden fence around our garden.
The wooden fence was painted yesterday.

examples.german: Der Holzzaun ist verrottet und muss ersetzt werden.
examples.english: The wooden fence is rotten and needs to be replaced.
The wooden fence serves as a privacy screen.
